title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When adding a table report item and not setting the dataset, the group dialog does not appear.
OB: The group dialog does not appear when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set.
SR: Please modify the code to ensure that the group dialog appears even when the dataset is not set.
